item.title: Open-Sourcing Old Projects
item.description: I have made the decision to open-source some of my old projects onto Github. These are ones that have not seen any love in a while. So with no further ado I am excited to announce the open-source debut of 3 such projects: PaprikaLang - A hand-rolled compiler targeting .Net. The Paprika language itself is also an experiment to disguise certain key functional techniques (like reduce/fold and immutability) and present in them more palatable way for the procedurally minded.
